Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ People are taking to social media to express their displeasure for the Stage 3 tax cuts in Australia. According to the Australia Institute
column3: these cuts would cost over $240 billion in the next decade and therefore are fiscally irresponsible. People are calling for a change in policy and urging others to sign petitions. Meanwhile
column4: there is speculation about how the upcoming budget will affect consumers
column5: with some questioning whether it will serve the people's best interests. Even so
column6: there are still those who harbor negative attitudes towards existing policies
column7: which they feel the public created and are tolerating despite evidence showing their ineffectiveness.
